---
title: "MMRP"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(sf)
```

```{r}
df <- data.table::fread(here::here("inst/extdata/mmrp.csv"))
```

```{r}
df  <- df[!is.na(df$Northing), ]
df_sf <- st_as_sf(df, coords = c("Easting", "Northing"), crs = 2228) %>%
  st_transform(4326)
```

```{r}
ord <- esca::ft_ord
```

```{r}
# 2228 = 339190
mec <- st_intersection(df_sf, ord)
```

```{r}
plot(mec["Grid"])
```
```{r}
esca <- esca::esca_parcels
mec <- st_intersection(mec, esca)
```
```{r}
plot(mec["Report.ID"])
```
